Author: davidw
Title: Everything I need to know about economics I learned from beer

Author: davidw
Content: IMO the reason that Microsoft managed to get its monopoly (one of the reasons, at least) is that they "settled" for controlling the software on top of an open platform, whereas Apple wanted control of both the OS and the hardware, thus biting off more than they could chew.

Author: RyanGWU82
Content: Nope.  Apple publishes instructions to help users upgrade the memory of all Mac models (except the Mini?) and the hard drives of most models.

Author: keaneu
Title: The end of Microsoft as we know it?

Author: cperciva
Content: When I've been asked to review papers, I've been explicitly asked for a vote of "publish", "reject", or "this might be worth publishing if improvements are made".
